ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.SHOW_IF: (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (HIVE_SERVER == 'HIVE2' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[]) OR (HIVE_SERVER == 'HIVE' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1Standalone[])

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_ADDITIONAL_JDBC
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='STANDALONE')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVESERVER2_LOCAL_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVESERVER2_LOCAL_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop1[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_JDBC_URL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_CLASSNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='STANDALONE' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_SSL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[]) AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2') AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSL[])

PARAMETER.NAME: SSL_TRUST_STORE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_SSL]) AND (USE_KRB=='false' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSLwithKerberos[] OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND (USE_SSL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SSL_TRUST_STORE_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_SSL]) AND (USE_KRB=='false' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSLwithKerberos[] OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND (USE_SSL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop1[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: EXECUTION_ENGINE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE == 'EMBEDDED') AND (DISTRIBUTION == 'CUSTOM' OR (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportTezForHive[])) AND (LOAD_ACTION == 'INSERT')

PARAMETER.NAME: PARQUET_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Parquet is only supported if the distribution uses embedded Hive version 0.10 or later.

PARAMETER.NAME: TARGET_TABLE_IS_A_PARQUET_TABLE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (((USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'true') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportParquetFormat[]) AND ((LOAD_ACTION=='LOAD') OR ((LOAD_ACTION=='INSERT') AND (TARGET=='TABLE'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in.

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.5.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (isShow[PARQUET_COMPRESSION]) AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='PIVOTAL_HD') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0'))

IMPORT.NAME: snappy-java-1.0.5.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND isShow[PARQUET_COMPRESSION]) AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (PARQUET_COMPRESSION=='SNAPPY') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))
